Html:
hi,

could nunit be please included within the svn branch?
(there shouldn't be license issues on this, its license is very permissive)

this would make the solution compile out of the box and ease contribution.

btw, the referred nunit version is quite old, 2.5.5 - there's a stable 2.5.10

thank you 

Federico

I look forward to NUNit being 2.5.10 being included together with some unit tests. I have recently stylecopped HTML Agliity Pack. I have just checked and Resharper could not find any unit tests to run!
